response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who truly appreciates and can utilize the product to its full potential. We are confident that this investment will provide significant returns for you. Should you be interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase, please let us know at your earliest convenience. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
